name: Whale Island
description:
Whale Island is an immersive VR experience that allows audiences to experience the wonder of a different world. The experience is set within an unfamiliar but engaging archipelago of islands separated by mist with many varied craft flying by.

Whale Island allows people to enjoy time in a relaxing environment watching the (different) world go by.

Two different experiences are set around Whale Island, the first is based on a platform near the island where a narrative plays out.

The second experience takes you for a flight over the island. Other craft pass by as you fly past the island.

Whale Island is a room scale experience, immersing you in a relaxed, intriguing and interesting world.
